blogs.name: Yurnero Sven
blogs.title: Coding- A way of life
blogs.shortdescription: The most traditional page on any blog is the About page. This page tells new visitors to your blog what it is about, who you are and why you have a blog about theparticular topic. Depending on your niche and your    style, the information you provide can be “all business” or personal and fun.
